eGifts.altText: Two graduates hands meet in the middle where one is holding a rolled diploma and one holding a hot Starbucks cup and Cheers, Grad is written in red arching over a yellow background with stars.
For My Sunshine is written in bold yellow letters and arched over a yellow sun across orange rays radiating from the sun.
A blue wiener dog wearing a bun topped with ketchup and a red and white striped hat trimmed in blue stars struts across this card against a dark blue background that is covered in light blue stars.
On a green and yellow background a smiling cloud and smiling sun cheers their iced beverages with the words Friends Buy Friends Coffee written in orange.
A Starbucks cup is falling on its side, spilling out multi-colored confetti against a light green speckled background.
Two hands meet in a high five against a background with Great Work arched over the top of the hands and Deserves Coffee across the bottom.
Happy Birthday is written in dark green block letters against an off-white background and surrounded by multi-colored balloons, candles and confetti.
Make Today A You Day is written in bold yellow letters against a dark green background and surrounded by Starbucks treats and beverages.
You Belong Here is in lowercase letters and against a green background. The words You and Here are highlighted by a rainbow emphasis.
A hand extends from the right holding a steaming Starbucks beverage, with My Treat written in green letters above it against a shaded green and white background.
A Big Thank You with the words A Big written in small pale blue letters and arched over the top of the larger words Thank You.
A bouquet of multi colored flowers sits in a blue vase on a green table against a light blue background, with Thinkin of Ya written in wavy green letters next to it.
“You’re Best” are at top and bottom with “Just” between You’re and Best, against a background covered in stars and paint.
Two hands hold up Starbucks beverages from the bottom of this card with the words Yay for Coffee arched over them against a pink background covered in confetti.
A rainbow stretches across with a white cloud at each end against a green background, with the words Sending Good Vibes under the rainbow.
“Woohoo” is written in white centered against blue and surrounded by dots, stars and starbursts in shades of green, yellow and pink.
A bright pink frosted cake sits on a white plate, with lit candles on top and one piece missing, with the words Happy Birthday written in white lettering across the size of the cake.
A blue wiener dog wearing a bun topped with ketchup and a red and white striped hat trimmed in blue stars struts across this card against a dark blue background that is covered in light blue stars.
White block letters spell out Happy 4th across the center of the card against a dark blue background that is covered in red, white and light blue stars
Happy Birthday is written in dark green block letters against an off-white background and surrounded by multi-colored balloons, candles and confetti.
A bright pink frosted cake sits on a white plate, with lit candles on top and one piece missing, with the words Happy Birthday written in white lettering across the size of the cake.
Mirror ball with blue, green and purple squares hangs in the center of this card against a dark blue background.
It's Your Birth-Yay is in white letters over a yellow birthday cake with a slice missing that has red candles against a blue background.
A slice of cake is surrounded by doughnuts, cupcakes, and a Starbucks drink. On each treat is a lit birthday candle.
A hand extends from the right holding a steaming Starbucks beverage, with My Treat written in green letters above it against a shaded green and white background.
Thank You is written in bold white letters against a gold background surrounded by sparkles and stars and framed by a bright pink border.
A Big Thank You with the words A Big written in small pale blue letters and arched over the top of the larger words Thank You.
This One's on Me is written above a head with blue hair, an iced beverage on top of the blue hair and two hands holding Starbucks cups.
Vase holding green, yellow and blue flowers is centered against blue background with card reading Thanks A Ton attached to bouquet.
A Starbucks cup is falling on its side, spilling out multi-colored confetti against a light green speckled background.
“Woohoo” is written in white centered against blue and surrounded by dots, stars and starbursts in shades of green, yellow and pink.
Awwwww Yea is written in wavy green letters across a star exploding from the center of the card against a light pink background and surrounded by stars and flowers.
Keep Crushin’ It, written in white and shadowed in red, blue and orange, are exploding out of a blue background and surrounded by stars.
The words For All You Do are written inside individual shapes centered against a dark orange background surrounded by multi-colored stars.
You Amaze Me is centered against a background surrounded by yellow and white shooting stars with You and Me below the word Amaze.
“You’re Best” are at top and bottom with “Just” between You’re and Best, against a background covered in stars and paint.
You Got This is written in wavy orange letters and centered against a background of puffy white clouds in a light blue sky.
A rainbow stretches across with a white cloud at each end against a green background, with the words Sending Good Vibes under the rainbow.
Two hands reaching from each side to toast holding Starbucks beverage cups with When In Doubt Coffee in red and below the hands.
Make Today A You Day is written in bold yellow letters against a dark green background and surrounded by Starbucks treats and beverages.
For My Sunshine is written in bold yellow letters and arched over a yellow sun across orange rays radiating from the sun.
You’re Amazing is written in bright green letters across a dark blue and green patterned background and surrounded by pink stars.
A bouquet of multi colored flowers sits in a blue vase on a green table against a light blue background, with Thinkin of Ya written in wavy green letters next to it.
Love You, Girl is written in maroon letters, stacked on a light pink background and surrounded by flowers, rainbows, and hearts.
Two hands meet in a high five against a background with Great Work arched over the top of the hands and Deserves Coffee across the bottom.
Above plus Beyond equals You is written in green letters across a wavy background texture of purple, blue, green, and yellow background with a few white stars.
A laptop sits on a desk with a plant. An arm rests on the desk holding a pen and iced beverage, with the words We'd Be Lost Without You.
Set against a sparkle light blue background, In white font is "Your Hard Work" and in green script Noticed is in the bottom left corner.
Two hands hold up Starbucks beverages from the bottom of this card with the words Yay for Coffee arched over them against a pink background covered in confetti.

An orange digital clock with the word “coffee” written across the face sits in the center of an off-white background surrounded by green stars, with the word It’s written above and OClock written below the clock.
A close up of a white Siren covers the left half of this Starbucks green card.

Starbucks Coffee Company is written in white block letters across the center of a dark green background, with Established 1971, Seattle WA written below it in smaller white letters. 1971 is written in outline letters at the top left.
Three Starbucks Siren logos are shown, including the brown Siren, the black and white Siren and the free-floating Siren.
A pink sand castle stands in the center of a beach scene surrounded by an umbrella, beach ball, crab, and sand bucket with the ocean in the background.
This card is ready for the road, with A Sip For The Trip in red above three hands waving out of a sunroof and holding a Starbucks beverage.
An inviting picnic of food items including cake, fruit, ice cream cones and a cold Starbucks beverage is spread out on a bright blanket.
